distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for aspell fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-17544: Fixed a stack-based buffer over-read in acommon:unescape in common/getdata.cpp via an isolated backslash (bsc#1153892).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libaspell.a in GNU Aspell before 0.60.8 has a stack-based buffer over-read in acommon::unescape in common/getdata.cpp via an isolated \ character.
notes.title: CVE description
